meaningMnemonic: When <radical>dirt</radical> and <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>suit</radical> one another, the flowers grow so tall that they make a <kanji>tower</kanji>! A flower tower made of flower power!
readingMnemonic: The only place flowers grow into <kanji>tower</kanji>s like this is in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. とうきょう dirt is the best. とうきょう flowers are the best. Thus, you end up with a lot of とうきょう towers.
